fields.name: vsString
fields.desc: A string describing the players in the game.

fields.name: modifiedString
fields.desc: A string describing when the game was last modified.

fields.name: imageString
fields.desc: An image associated with this game list entry.

values.name: LOCAL
values.desc: An image which is included with the application.

values.name: FACEBOOK
values.desc: An image which needs to be downloaded from Facebook.

fields.name: string
fields.desc: A string identifying an image.

fields.name: type
fields.desc: The type of this ImageString.

fields.name: column
fields.desc: Column at which mark was placed.

fields.name: row
fields.desc: Row at which mark was placed.

fields.name: playerNumber
fields.desc: The number of the player who performed this action.

fields.name: gameId
fields.desc: The ID of the game this Action belongs to.

fields.name: isSubmitted
fields.desc: Whether or not this action has been submitted.

fields.name: command
fields.desc: A command for this action.

fields.name: futureCommand
fields.desc: A command for this action which has been undone.

fields.name: name
fields.desc: The player's name.

fields.name: imageString
fields.desc: An image representing the player.

fields.name: pronoun
fields.desc: The pronoun to use to refer to this player.

fields.name: isComputerPlayer
fields.desc: True if the player is a computer player.

fields.name: computerDifficultyLevel
fields.desc: The difficulty level of this computer player.

fields.name: statusString
fields.desc: A string describing the current status of the game.

fields.name: statusImageString
fields.desc: An image representing the current status of the game.

fields.name: statusPlayer
fields.desc: The number of the player associated with the current game status e.g. because it is their turn.

fields.name: isComputerThinking
fields.desc: True if the AI is currently searching for a move in this game.

values.name: YOUR_TURN
values.desc: Section of games where it is the viewer's turn.

values.name: THEIR_TURN
values.desc: Section of games where it is not the viewer's turn.

values.name: GAME_OVER
values.desc: Section of games that have ended.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The ID of this game.

fields.name: player
fields.desc: A player in this game.

fields.name: profile
fields.desc: The profile for the corresponding player in the player list

fields.name: currentPlayerNumber
fields.desc: The player number of the player whose turn it is, or null if there is no current player.

fields.name: submittedAction
fields.desc: An action which has been submitted in this game.

fields.name: lastModified
fields.desc: The timestamp at which the last modification to this game occurred.

fields.name: victor
fields.desc: The number of a player who has won this game.

fields.name: isGameOver
fields.desc: True if this game has ended.

fields.name: isLocalMultiplayer
fields.desc: True if this is a local multiplayer game.
